org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects

Class DependencyGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects.DependencyGraph

  • public final class DependencyGraph
extends Object
    Class to track dependencies in a CompilerProject.

    There are four types of dependency that may exist from one ICompilationUnit to another ICompilationUnit.

    Inheritance Dependency
    If ICompilationUnit A contains a definition that extends a class or implements an interface defined in ICompilationUnit B, then there is an inheritance dependency from A to B.
    Signature Dependency
    If any of:
    • class member variable ( or constant ) type annotation expression
    • class method return type annotation expression
    • class method parameter type annotation expression
    • script variable ( or constant ) type annotation expression
    • script function return type annotation expression
    • script function parameter type annotation expression
    in ICompilationUnit A refers to a definition from ICompilationUnit B, then there is a signature dependency from A to B.
    Namespace Dependency
    If ICompilationUnit A depends on a namespace definition from ICompilationUnit B, then there is a namespace dependency from A to B.
    Expression Dependency
    If ICompilationUnit A contains any reference to ICompilationUnit B that does not result in any other type of dependency, then there exists an expression dependency from A to B.

    The code in this class intends to make adding or updating a dependency edge very fast and thread safe.

    • Method Detail

      • addDependency

        public void addDependency(ICompilationUnit depender,
                 ICompilationUnit dependee,
                 DependencyTypeSet dt,
                 String targetQName)
        Adds a dependency to the dependency graph.
        Parameters:
        depender - ICompilationUnit with a reference to a definition defined by the other ICompilationUnit.
        dependee - ICompilationUnit with a definition referred to by the other ICompilationUnit.
        dt - The dependency types to add from the "depender" to the "dependee".
        targetQName - A qname of the definition of the dependee that the depender depends on

      • topologicalSort

        public List<ICompilationUnit> topologicalSort(Collection<ICompilationUnit> roots)
        Computes the list of all ICompilationUnit's that the specified collection of ICompilationUnit's depends directly or indirectly. ICompilationUnit's that contain definitions that extend or implement definitions from other ICompilationUnit's will occur in the list after the ICompilationUnit's that contains the definitions that are extended or implemented. In cases where ICompilationUnits have no real dependencies between them this function employs a lexical sort on the ICompilationUnit's name.
        Parameters:
        roots - Collection of ICompilationUnit's that will be in the returned List along with any ICompilationUnit's they depend on directly or indirectly.
        Returns:
        List of all ICompilationUnit's that the specified collection of ICompilationUnit's depends directly or indirectly.

      • topologicalSort

        public List<ICompilationUnit> topologicalSort(Collection<ICompilationUnit> roots,
                                     Comparator<ICompilationUnit> comparator)
        Computes the list of all ICompilationUnit's that the specified collection of ICompilationUnit's depends directly or indirectly. ICompilationUnit's that contain definitions that extend or implement definitions from other ICompilationUnit's will occur in the list after the ICompilationUnit's that contains the definitions that are extended or implemented.
        Parameters:
        roots - Collection of ICompilationUnit's that will be in the returned List along with any ICompilationUnit's they depend on directly or indirectly.
        comparator - The comparator of last resort used to order ICompilationUnits when there are no real dependencies between them.
        Returns:
        List of all ICompilationUnit's that the specified collection of ICompilationUnit's depends directly or indirectly.

      • computeInvalidationSet

        public static Set<ICompilationUnit> computeInvalidationSet(Iterable<ICompilationUnit> roots)
        Computes the set of ICompilationUnit's that should be cleaned given a collection of ICompilationUnit's that are known to need cleaning.

        This method is not thread safe and must not be called while any compilation is occurring in any project in the workspace associated with the specified compilation units.

        Parameters:
        roots - ICompilationUnit's that are known to need cleaning
        Returns:
        Set of ICompilationUnit's that should be cleaned.

      • getDirectDependencies

        public Set<ICompilationUnit> getDirectDependencies(ICompilationUnit cu)
        Get the Set of ICompilationUnit's depended on directly by the specified ICompilationUnit.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A new Set of ICompilationUnit's that the specified ICompilationUnit directly depends on.

      • getDirectReverseDependencies

        public Set<ICompilationUnit> getDirectReverseDependencies(ICompilationUnit cu,
                                                 DependencyTypeSet types)
        Get the Set of ICompilationUnit's that directly depended on the specified ICompilationUnit.
        Parameters:
        cu - A compilation unit.
        types - Set of dependency types used to filter the returned set of ICompilationUnit's.
        Returns:
        A new Set of ICompilationUnit's that directly depend on the specified ICompilationUnit.

      • addEmbedCompilationUnit

        public void addEmbedCompilationUnit(EmbedCompilationUnit unit)
        Adds an EmbedCompilationUnit to the dependency graph. This is just like adding any other compilation unit, except for the fact that we may be in the middle of compiling a project. Thus, when we add an embed compilation unit we grab the dependency graph write lock.
        Parameters:
        unit - The embed compilation unit to be added.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(ICompilationUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        unit - An ICompilationUnit to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the ICompilationUnit unit exists in this DependencyGraph

      • getDependencySet

        public Map<String,DependencyTypeSet> getDependencySet(ICompilationUnit from,
                                             ICompilationUnit to)
        Finds the named dependencies between two compilation unit
        Parameters:
        from - The depender ICompilationUnit
        to - The dependee ICompilationUnit
        Returns:
        A copied non-synchronous Map from definition qname String to a DependencyTypeSet, representing the dependencies between two ICompilationUnit

      • getDependencyTypes

        public DependencyTypeSet getDependencyTypes(ICompilationUnit from,
                                   ICompilationUnit to)
        Finds the dependencies between two ICompilationUnits
        Parameters:
        from - The depender ICompilationUnit
        to - The dependee ICompilationUnit
        Returns:
        A copy of an DependencyTypeSet that is active between the two compilation units
